Name: Drama
Description: A Drama film is Narrative fiction (or semi-fiction) intended to be more serious in tone.

Name: Western
Description: A genre of fiction set in the American frontier and commonly associated with folk tales of the Western United States.

Name: Comedy
Description: Comedy is a genre of film in which the main emphasis is on humor. These films are designed to make the audience laugh through amusement and most often work by exaggerating characteristics for humorous effect.

Name: Science Fiction
Description: Science fiction (or sci-fi) is a film genre that uses speculative, fictional science-based depictions of phenomena thatare not fully accepted by mainstream science, such as extraterrestrial lifeforms, spacecraft, robots, cyborgs, dinosaurs, mutants,interstellar travel, time travel, or other technologies.

Name: Crime
Description: Crime films, in the broadest sense, is a film genre inspired by and analogous to the crime fiction literary genre. Films of this genre generally involve various aspects of crime and its detection.

Name: Action
Description: Action is a film genre in which the protagonist is thrust into a series of events that typically involve violence and physical feats.
